mean_cn: pron. 哪个，哪几个，……的，……那个
mean_en: used in questions to ask somebody to be exact about one or more people or things from a limited number; used to be exact about the thing or things that you mean; used to give more information about something
sentence: The teacher asked the girl which pen was hers.
sentence_trans: 老师问女孩哪一支笔是她的。
